description:
A success story of the Sisonke Rising initiative.

Speakers Bio:
Theo Bohnen
Hi, I'm Theo. I've been programming professionally for 8+ years and have loved it for many more. I'm extremely passionate about programming and all things related to software development. I love helping others become better programmers & problem solvers.

Moral Jera
Moral is currently a high school student who spends his nights and weekends learning Python, JavaScript and coding in general. Moral loves learning and sharing his passion with his friends.
title: Sisonke Rising
